samples.description: Config files to setup the experiment server. Go through the README of the sample to see how to run the experiment-server. This sample is to be executed outside of Unit, hence, it doesn't have to be inside the `Assets` folder. Hence, after importing this example, you could move the direcotry in `Assets/Samples/UXF extensions/0.1.1/Sample experiment-server setup` to the root of the unity project (e.g. `Experiment`) outside of the `Assets` folder.
Contains a sample implemenation. The implementation is based on the study config in the Sample experiment-server setup sample. To use, import the sample the play the SampleUXFExtensionScene
